__comment: 'files' key is required. Its value is an array of objects, each for an individual file.

files.__comment: If there are some keys left out, the EXIF values will not be replaced.
files.__comment0: File path should be relative to the root image dir.
files.__comment1: EXIF dateTime format is '2006:01:02 15:04:05'. Any trailing spaces or null chars will be trimmed.
files.__comment2: Has to be either a valid tz database name or 'Local'. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones
